fields.name: Monster Organ
fields.effect: If you consume this, archive this card. Roll 1d10. On a result of 6+, you contract a parasite. Archive all consumable gear in your gear grid now.

fields.name: Love Juice
fields.effect: During the settlement phase, you may archive this to Story Event Intimacy. Nominated survivors must be able to consume.

fields.name: Skull
fields.effect: When you gain this, a survivor of your choice gains +1 insanity.

fields.name: Perfect Organ
fields.effect: If you consume this, archive this card. Roll 1d10. On a result of 6+, you contract a millennium parasite and gain +10 Hunt XP.

fields.flavor_text: You have no idea what monster bit this is. Can be used as a bone, organ or hide!

fields.name: Black Lichen
fields.effect: You may consume this. If you do, your lips turn gray, your hair whitens and you become infertile. Gain +1 courage, +1 understanding and suffer the destroyed genitals severe waist injury.

fields.name: Cocoon Membrane
fields.flavor_text: Thin copper hairs permeate this jellylike substance. Lanterns are repelled by the copper hairs, their light bending to avoid them.

fields.name: Elder Cat Teeth
fields.flavor_text: As sharp as they are strange.

fields.name: Fresh Acanthus
fields.effect: Archive this to fully heal 1 hit location, including injury levels and armor points.

fields.name: Lantern Tube
fields.effect: When you gain this, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you find something stuck inside! Add 1 Broken Lantern basic resource to the settlement's storage.

fields.name: Perfect Crucible
fields.effect: When you craft with Perfect Crucible, an ancient bacteria is released into the air. Suffer -1d10 population and archive this card.

fields.name: Legendary Horns
fields.flavor_text: Holding them fills you with power.

fields.name: Second Heart
fields.flavor_text: It still tries to bite you.

fields.name: Curious Hand
fields.flavor_text: Holding this fills you with sadness.
fields.effect: When you gain this, a random survivor gains +1 insanity.

fields.name: Shimmering Mane
fields.flavor_text: It shimmers in the lantern light.
fields.effect: Archive this to gain 2 basic hide resources.

fields.name: Sinew
fields.flavor_text: These stringy guts are quite useful.

fields.name: White Fur
fields.flavor_text: Luxurious and soft to the touch.

fields.name: Bladder
fields.flavor_text: It shimmers in the lantern light.
fields.effect: Archive this to gain 2 basic hide resources.

fields.name: Large Flat Tooth
fields.flavor_text: Its surface is rough and bumpy.
fields.effect: When you gain this, a survivor of your choice gains +1 insanity.

fields.name: Screaming Brain
fields.effect: Consume: Archive this and gain survival up to the current limit.

fields.name: Phoenix Eye
fields.flavor_text: Filled with a thick metallic liquid.

fields.name: Phoenix Finger
fields.effect: When you gain this, a survivor of your choice gains +3 insanity.

fields.name: Rainbow Droppings
fields.effect: Consume: Archive this and roll 1d10. On a 7+, gain +1 permanent speed. Otherwise, your heart explodes, killing you instantly.

fields.name: Small Feathers
fields.flavor_text: Soft interior with razor sharp edges.

fields.name: Wishbone
fields.flavor_text: A delicate bone with a strange aura.

fields.name: Crab Spider
fields.effect: Consume: Archive this and gain +3 survival.

fields.name: Cyclops Fly
fields.effect:
Consume: Archive this and roll 1d10.
1d10 Result
1 - 3 The fly's eye explodes, releasing acids that melt your insides. You die.
4 - 5 Slight citrus flavor. No effect.
6+ Gain permanent +1 accuracy.

fields.name: Fiddler Crab Spider
fields.flavor_text: Consume: Archive this and gain the Armored Fist fighting art.

fields.name: Gibbering Haremite
fields.effect:
When you gain this, unless you consume it immediately, it latches on and removes all head armor points. If this is in the settlement storage when survivors depart, add another to storage and suffer -1 population.
Consume: Archive this and roll 1d10.
1d10 Result
1 - 3 The haremite's jaw unhooks and swallows your head whole. You die.
4 - 5 Dissolves in your mouth. +3 survival.
6+ Gain +1 permanent movement.

fields.name: Hissing Cockroach
fields.effect:
Consume: Archive this to lose all survival and gain 2d10 insanity.
If you are insane, you must consume this.

fields.name: Lonely Ant
fields.effect: Consume: Archive this to swap your insanity and survival values.

fields.name: Nightmare Tick
fields.effect:
Consume: Archive this and roll 1d10.
1d10 Result
1 - 3 The tick grabs the roof of your mouth and sucks all your blood. You die.
4 - 5 Tastes like iron. No effect.
6+ Gain permanent +1 evasion.

fields.name: Sword Beetle
fields.effect:
Consume: Archive this and roll 1d10
1d10 Result
1 - 3 The beetle burrows into your brain. You die instantly
4 - 5 Tough and disgusting. No effect.
6+ Gain permanent +1 strength.

fields.name: Cabled Vein
fields.flavor_text: A dense bundle of bloody tubes.

fields.name: Dragon Iron
fields.flavor_text: It feels heavy, but when dropped, falls as slowly as a feather.

fields.name: Horn Fragment
fields.flavor_text: Nearby speech causes them to resonate.

fields.name: Husk
fields.flavor_text: A decaying layer of former skin.

fields.name: King's Claws
fields.flavor_text: Disturbingly warm, and sharp enough to draw blood with a touch.

fields.name: Radioactive Dung
fields.flavor_text: Gives off smoke with an acrid odor.

fields.name: Veined Wing
fields.flavor_text: Blood drips from it at a constant rate.

fields.name: Beetle Horn
fields.effect:
Lock Requires Scarification
Endeavor Horn Ceremony - Archive and roll 1d10
1d10 Result
1-4 Your brain is punctured and you die.
5+ Brain Stimulation. Gain the benefits of Age 1 and Age 2 without gaining Hunt XP. Brain Stimulation ignores the 'once in a lifetime' rule on the Age story event.

fields.name: Century Fingernails
fields.flavor_text: These nails are never clipped. Instead, they are folded and hammered hundreds of times into an impossibly fine edge.

fields.name: Century Shell
fields.flavor_text: This ancient and mineral-rich armor plate is covered with razor wind scratches.
fields.effect: You may spend this as if it were a Scarab Shell resource.

fields.name: Compound Eye
fields.flavor_text: A cluster of differently colored eyes, each filled with a creamy, tangy syrup.
fields.effect: If you have 3+ courage, you may consume and archive this to gain +3d10 insanity.

fields.name: Elytra
fields.flavor_text: The ribbed underside of these large shells makes an ideal surface to grind weapons.
fields.effect: A survivor may archive this to give all of their attacks in the next showdown Sharp.

fields.name: Scarab Shell
fields.flavor_text: Cool and oily to the touch. Lantern light reveals a brilliant band of color dancing on its surface.

fields.name: Scarab Wing
fields.flavor_text: When soaked in water, these vein-filled wings gain some elasticity.

fields.name: Underplate Fungus
fields.flavor_text: A corkscrew-shaped fungus that grows in the empty channels between the Dung Beetle Knight's armor plating.
